title: The Ballad of Lucy Whipple (2001)
description:
"For teenager California Morning Whipple, the only thing worse than her name is the idea of moving across the country to live in her namesake state."
Recorded from Netflix using Freecorder for the audio and HyperCam 2 for the video. Movie is grainy and lags a bit with occasional blackouts of the screen that last a few seconds, but it's decent and watchable.
For some reason, this movie is not out on DVD, which is why I've uploaded it here.
NOTE: I haven't watched this recorded copy the whole way through; only skipped through a few scenes to see how it had turned out, so although I can't record another copy because it was taken off Netflix on May 1, 2014, report problems to me anyway, just so I can warn people in this description.
